title: HDFC ERGO Retail Health Base Product. This add-on cannot be opted in isolation or as a separate product.
sample_text:
B. Operative Clause 
a. This Add-on can be opted without any additional premium only at inception or at the time of 
renewal of Base Policy. 
b. All other general terms & conditions, exclusions, clauses, eligibility rules, and definitions applicable 
to the Base Product will apply to this add-on unless specifically stated otherwise in this document 
or on the Policy Schedule of the Base Policy. 
c. Policy duration of this Add-on shall be same as that of the Base Policy. 
d. Base Policy or Base Product means the HDFC ERGO Retail Health Insurance policy or product 
to which this add-on is attach
